name: is-date-object
description: Is this value a JS Date object? This module works cross-realm/iframe, and despite ES6 @@toStringTag.

scripts.test: npm run lint && node --harmony --es-staging test.js && npm run security
scripts.lint: npm run jscs && npm run eslint
